pages.text: Something about the Midnight Aberration inspired me to craft a sort of rifle with its catastrophic power. As it turns out, such a weapon can do a lot more than destroy. This has opened up certain possibilities I would otherwise have had no way of knowing.

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: Firing the Yttric Rifle requires ammunition - obviously - and careful timing. After selecting my desired firing mode, I must charge up the rifle enough so that I can hit my target, but not so much that it overloads and backfires. At times, I have heard a sort of ringing that may help indicate this.

pages.title: Practice
pages.text: For practice with the rifle - which may be wise - I may use a Power Meter. Firing at its target will show me how much power was in my shot, in addition to letting me get used to the timings.
